name: Buffet Boss: Rolling Sushi
summary: A brand-new sushi restaurant has arrived, and it's time to dive into exciting new challenges! Players can master the art of delicious sushi rolls just like a pro sushi chef, create refreshing bubble tea that will have customers coming back for more, use a conveyor belt to serve guests efficiently and keep things moving smoothly, and expand their restaurant to become the top dining destination in the city. Rise to the occasion, build your reputation, and become the ultimate sushi and bubble tea sensation.
